pdf-toolbox-document-0.1.0: A collection of tools for processing PDF files.

Safe HaskellNone
LanguageHaskell98

Pdf.Document

Description

Mid level utils for processing PDF file

Basic example how to get number of pages in document

 import Pdf.Document

 withBinaryFile "input.pdf" ReadMode $ handle ->
   pdf <- pdfWithHandle handle
   doc <- document pdf
   catalog <- documentCatalog doc
   rootNode <- catalogPageNode catalog
   count <- pageNodeNKids rootNode
   print count
